title: Next step in maturity for PlayWise!
content:
As of today @Fiber89 and @Bullit Pro0f will be guardians for the PlayWise swarm. 

Together they will make this idea into a reality. Searching for the proper leader(s), product development, gathering funds and who knows, you might just buy your own PlayWise for Christmas this year ðŸ˜‰.
If you have any question, ideas or suggestions, feel free to contact them.
